xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya » Indriya
Pakiṇṇakaghaṭanā
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Indriya
Pakiṇṇakaghaṭanā
460.
1471Indriya nissaya purejāta vippayutta atthi avigatanti nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā ekaṃ, naanantare ekaṃ, nasamanantare ekaṃ, nasahajāte ekaṃ, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye ekaṃ, napacchājāte ekaṃ, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, naāhāre ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā ekaṃ, novigate ekaṃ.
<< Indriyamissakaghaṭanāup Sahajātasāmaññaghaṭanā >>
